Title: Chapter Three: The Pollywog
Writer: Matt Duffer (created by), Ross Duffer (created by), Justin Doble, Jessie Nickson-Lopez (executive story editor), Paul Dichter (staff writer), Kate Trefry (staff writer)
Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
Plot: Dustin adopts a strange new pet, and Eleven grows increasingly impatient. A well-meaning Bob urges Will to stand up to his fears.
